item.title: Adding Katex Support
item.author: Unknown
item.description: Self-notes on adding Katex support to this website. Should work for other Zola themes as well.

item.title: DroneOS Part 1
item.author: Unknown
item.description: DroneOS is a video game I've been envisioning for some time now. My plan for it is to create a functioning two-dimensional video game with a top-down perspective. This document will outline the plans and game-design goals for me to call the project finished, with further posts illustrating the work that has been completed.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.author: Unknown
item.description: First post with Zola after moving off of Quartz.
